game.name: Sky Reach
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Sky Reach is a neon cyberpunk infinite climber where every jump counts. Shoot energy waves, collide with the world to create platforms, and carve your own route upward. Play solo or in local co-op and push for ever-higher scores.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Sky Reach is a neon cyberpunk infinite climber where every jump counts. Shoot energy waves, collide with the world to create platforms, and carve your own route upward. Play solo or in local co-op and push for ever-higher scores.
